patterns: where do mental health problems come from

responses: Problems in mental health can stem from biological, social, and psychological issues that effect your life.

patterns: what can i do to feel better

responses: If you are struggling with mental health related problems, it is highly advised that you see a mental health professional, I can only do so much.

responses: If your beliefs and thoughts are impacting your day-to-day life negatively, its time to seek professional help!
Finding the right methods is a difficult process. Be open to new approaches and dont loose hope!

responses: It sounds like you are experiencing grief. You should prioritize your own needs first and give yourself as much time to heal as you need.
